title: Plat Team Sucht
body:
Hello

I am Kushranda and my team is looking for a:

*  mid
* top
* jungler
* support

Requirements
- Decent behavior
- Ready to commit to a team and train together
- Plat or higher
- At least 16 years old
- Eligible to participate in the German Battlegrounds

Pm me or add me in game if you are interested.

Cheers
